title: Land Sale
details: 40 Perches to be sold in Panadura. 3Km from Ealuwila Janction, in kiribariya road.(Carpet road) Land consists of Coconut, Jak & other tress. Land is situated in very good residential area. Land is facing to a 15 feet wide road.3 phase electricity & Tap water also exists. Land is closed to southern highway entrance panadura. Rs.300,000/- per perch. One end of the land is facing to a paddy field.
